author: Alberto Nardelli, Alex Wickham
title: A Tory MP Is A Paid Consultant Of A Company That Is Selling Private Coronavirus Tests
description: According to the register of MPs’ financial interests, Owen Paterson is a paid consultant to Randox Laboratories, a company that is selling COVID-19 tests online. View Entire Post ›
content:
Owen Paterson, the Conservative MP and former cabinet minister, is a paid advisor to a company that is selling coronavirus tests online to British consumers and private clinics.
According to the register of MPs financial interests, Paterson has been a consul… [+4204 chars]
